title: Localization in Class Librabry project
body:
I have a class library project and two localizations files:

default: SmsApiLocalization.resx polish: SmsApiLocalization.pl.resx

I'am creating dll file from this project and using this file in WinForms application. Problem is, WinForms application is taking values only from SmsApiLocalization.pl.resx (I'am guessing because I have Windows 10 in polish version), no matter what language I'am setting in Program.cs. When I set something like this:

Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture = new System.Globalization.CultureInfo("en");
Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture = new System.Globalization.CultureInfo("en");

Winforms app always takes values from SmsApiLocalization.pl.resx and ignore other localizations. Do Yow how to fix this? I want to create multilanguage Dll file and use this in differents projects.
